elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Follow the examples in the tool and write down your thoughts on the following questions.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Does wearing a full-body veil constitute a violation of physical or mental integrity?
elements.correctAnswer: No, because wearing the veil itself does not cause any injuries.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Is a woman's autonomy being restricted against her free and reasonable will?
elements.correctAnswer: If the woman can decide without external pressure, then no. If she has to fear any sanctions, then yes.

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: Is the woman used as a means to an end?
elements.correctAnswer:
Under external or unspoken coercion, yes (purpose: social order in which men rule over women). If, on the other hand, women who are capable of judgment subordinate themselves to a religious community, for example, then no.

Conclusion: This case is controversial because criteria 2 and 3 can be assessed differently in individual cases.
